item.title: BBQ Seasoning
item.description: Ingredients 1 tablespoon Smoked paprika 2 teaspoon Brown Sugar 1 teaspoon Garlic Powder 1+1/2 teaspoon Salt 1/2 teaspoon Black Pepper Steps Combine ingredients

item.title: Breakfast Potatoes
item.description: Prep: 10 minutes Cook: todo minutes Total: todo minutes Servings: todo Ingredients 3 large russet potatoes 2 tablespoons (30ml) olive oil 1 tablespoon (15ml) butter [[recipes/seasonings/Fry Seasoning|Fry Seasoning]] Steps Cube the potatoes up into 1cm pieces.

item.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Prep: 15 minutes Cook: 9 minutes Total: 25 minutes Servings: 8 cookies Ingredients 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 1/2 teaspoon baking soda 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter, softened 1/2 cup packed brown sugar 1/3 cup granulated sugar 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 egg 1 cup (6 ounces) Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels 1/2 cup chopped nuts (if omitting, add 1 to 2 tablespoons of all-purpose flour) Steps pre-heat oven to 375 Combine in small bowl: flour baking soda Beat in large bowl until creamy: butter sugar brown sugar vanilla extract Add egg to large bowl and beat well Gradually beat in small bowl contents to large bowl Stir in chocolate and nuts place 1/4 cup dollops on ungreased baking sheet Bake for 11-13 minutes until golden-brown Let cool on baking sheet source: Toll House Bag

item.title: Crispy Parmesan Chicken
item.description: Prep: ?? minutes Cook: ?? minutes Total: ?? minutes Servings: 2 Ingredients 2x5 oz Chicken Breast 1/4 cup pank breadcrumbs 1/4 cup parmesan cheese 1 teaspoon smoked paprika 2 tablespoons sour cream salt pepper olive oil Steps Preheat oven to 425 in a small bowl combine Panko Parmesan paprika large drizzle of olive oil pinch of salt pinch of pepper Pat chicken dry with paper towels Season chicken all over with salt and pepper Place chicken on baking sheet Spread tops of chicken with sour cream Mound tops of chicken with pank mixture from step 2 Roast for 15-20 minutes source: hello fresh

item.title: Crunchy Onion Chicken
item.description: Prep: todo minutes Cook: todo minutes Total: todo minutes Servings: todo Ingredients 2x 5oz chicken breasts crispy fried onions 1/4 cup shredded monterey jack cheese [[Honey Dijon Dressing]] Steps Preheat oven to 425 Crush crispy fried onions as fine as possible stir in shredded monterey jack cheese pat chicken dry with paper towels and place on baking sheet Season chicken all over with salt and pepper Evenly spread tops of chicken with [[Honey Dijon Dressing]] Mound coated chicken tops with onion/cheese mixture, pressing to adhere Bake in oven until cooked (15-20 minutes)

item.title: Frozen Mudslide
item.description: Servings: 1 Ingredients 1 oz vodka 1 oz Kahlua 1.5 oz Baileys 1.5 oz heavy cream .75 cup ice Steps Place all ingredients in a blender Blend until smooth Serve, optionally, add chocolate sauce on top

item.title: Honey Butter BBQ Pork
item.description: Total: 10 minutes Servings: 2 Ingredients salt pepper 2x pork chop [[recipes/seasonings/BBQ Seasoning|BBQ Seasoning]] olive oil Steps Pat pork dry with paper towels Season lightly with salt and pepper Rub all over with [[recipes/seasonings/BBQ Seasoning|BBQ Seasoning]] Heat a large drizzle of oil in a large pan over medium-high heat Add pork, cook until browned and cooked through (2-3 minutes per side) source: hello fresh

item.title: Instant Pot Chicken Alfredo
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 20 minutes Total: 40 minutes Servings: 4 Ingredients 1¬†pound¬†boneless skinless chicken thighs,¬†cut into 1-inch chunks Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper,¬†to taste 1¬†tablespoon¬†unsalted butter 3¬†cloves¬†garlic,¬†minced ¬º¬†cup¬†dry white wine 2¬†cups¬†chicken stock 1¬†cup¬†heavy cream 8¬†ounces¬†fettuccini noodles,¬†broken in half 3¬†ounces¬†freshly grated Parmesan 2¬†tablespoons¬†chopped fresh parsley leaves Steps Season chicken with 3/4 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.

item.title: Mashed potatoes
item.description: Prep: 5 minutes Cook: 20 minutes Total: 25 minutes Servings: 2 Ingredients Kosher salt 1 1/2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes 1/2 cup whole milk or heavy cream, plus more as needed 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, plus more as needed 1 ounce cream cheese or sour cream, at room temperature (optional) Freshly ground black pepper Steps Place a pot of salted water on heat Meanwhile, prep potatoes by cutting into small chunks (~1cm) When water is boiling add potatoes until tender (15-20 minutes) While potatoes boil, warm 1 tbsp of butter and a half cup of milk When potatoes are soft, drain and return to pan over medium heat Add warm butter.

item.title: Peanut Butter Cookies
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 10 minutes Total: 30 minutes Servings: 60 cookies Ingredients 16oz (475ml) smooth peanut butter 12oz (350ml) shortening 1 tablespoon (15ml) salt 4 eggs 4oz (120ml) milk 12oz (350ml) sugar 9oz (265ml) brown sugar 1 tablespoon (15ml) baking soda 24oz (.

item.title: Potato Soup
item.description: Times Total: 70 mins Servings: 8 Ingredients 1 1/2 pounds baking potatoes 1/4 pound butter 2 cups diced yellow onion 1/3 cup all purpose flour 5 cups water 1/4 cup low sodium chicken base 1 cup instant potato flakes (flavored ones if you like) 3/4 teaspoon dried basil 1/2 teaspoon Tabasco sauce 1 cup heavy cream 1 cup milk salt to taste white pepper to taste Ham, if you’re into that Steps Preheat oven to 400.

item.title: Pumpkin Bread
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 70 minutes Total: 90 minutes Servings: 2 Loaves ![[attachments/pumpkinBread.png]] Ingredients 2 cups all-purpose flour, spooned into measuring cup and leveled-off 1/2 tsp salt 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp ground cloves 1 tsp ground cinnamon 1 tsp ground nutmeg 1-1/2 sticks (3/4 cup) unsalted butter, softened 2 cups sugar 2 large eggs 1 15-oz can 100% pure pumpkin (I use Libby’s) Steps Preheat oven to 325F grease two 8x4" loaf pans with butter dust pans with flour in a medium bowl, combine: flour salt baking soda baking powder cloves cinnamon nutmeg In mixer bowl, beat on medium speed: butter sugar once blended, add eggs one at a time, beating after each continue beating until light and fluffy beat in pumpkin add flour mixture and mix on low speed turn batter into pans dividing evenly bake for 65-75 minutes let cool for about 10 minutes source: https://www.

item.title: Tequila Sunrise
item.description: Servings: 1 Ingredients 2.5 cups ice 2 oz tequila 4 oz Orange Juice .75 oz Grenadine Steps Fill Glass with 1.
